de.team33.libs.provision.v1

Interface Features


  • public interface Features
    Abstracts a kind of container with variable but well-typed properties that can be referenced using special keys.

    To get an instance use Features.Builder.build() or Features.Builder.prepare() and Supplier.get()

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Features.Builder
      Implements a builder for Features.
      static interface  Features.Key<T>
      Abstracts a key type that is used to refer to features in this context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Features.Builder builder()
      Retrieves a new FeatureMap.Builder.
      <T> T get(Features.Key<T> key)
      Retrieves a feature, specified by a given key.

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        static Features.Builder builder()
        Retrieves a new FeatureMap.Builder.

      • get

        <T> T get(Features.Key<T> key)
        Retrieves a feature, specified by a given key.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when there is no feature specified by the given key in this map.
